section.title: Sliding Windows
section.para: Sliding Window is a way to scope the events of interest as a the ones belonging to a window that is constantly moving. The two most common sliding window implementations are time based windows and length based windows.
The next sections will detail each of them.

important.para: Sliding Windows are only available when running the engine in STREAM mode. Check the Event Processing Mode section for details on how the STREAM mode works.
